Package rl.util.gui

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationFrame
    Useful base class for building GUIs.
    IndentationUtil
    Provides indentation functionality for Swing text components.
    IndentationUtil.NewLineAction
    Inserts a new line character at the current caret position and additionally the same number of spaces as in the line before.
    IndentationUtil.TabAction
    Inserts and removes groups of four spaces depending on text selection state and the value of attribute shift.
    PopupShower
    Useful helper class for showing popup menus.
    TextAreaWithUndo
    Extends the swing text area with local undo functionality.
    TextEditorDialog
    Provides a simple dialog for editing string values in text fields (for one-line properties) and scrolled text areas (for texts which do not fit in on line).

Package rl.util.gui Description

Contains useful helper classes to build graphical user interfaces with Swing.
